{ "content":{ "from":"features@sparkpostbox.com", "html":"

SparkPost Email Template Features

Insert substitution variables: I like {{flavor}} ice cream.

Make some content conditional: Your ice cream is {{if flavor == "strawberry"}} pink {{else}} cream{{end}}-colored.

Iterate through items in a list:

    {{each desserts}}
  • {{loop_var}}
    • {{end}}

Inserting HTML using variables: {{{setMenuHTML}}}

Inserting HTML containing variables: {{render_dynamic_content(dynamic_html.setMenuHTMLWithSpecial)}}

Controlling links:

  • Named links for reporting: SparkPost
  • Labelling an unsubscribe linke: unsubscribe
  • Controlling link tracking for a single link: don't track this

", "subject":"features", "text":"SparkPost Email Template Features Insert substitution variables: I like {{flavor}} ice cream. Make some content conditional: Your ice cream is {{if flavor == "strawberry"}} pink {{else}} cream{{end}}-colored. Iterate through items in a list: {{each desserts}} - {{loop_var}} {{end}} Inserting text using variables: {{{setMenuText}}} Inserting text containing variables: {{render_dynamic_content(dynamic_plain.setMenuTextWithSpecial)}} Controlling links: - Named links for reporting: https://www.sparkpost.com/[[data-msys-linkname="SparkPost"]] - Labelling an unsubscribe linke: http://www.example.com/unsubs[[data=msys-unsubscribe="1"]] - Controlling link tracking for a single link: https://www.example.com/[[data-msys-clicktrack="0"]] " }, "id":"features", "name":"features" }
